explanation.text:

Condemn is to express complete disapproval of something.

dear----/dɪə/
year----/jɪə/ 
there---/ðɛə/
near---/nɪə/
from the explanation above, you can see that, ''there'' (ðɛə) has the same vowel sound as the underlined letters in pear (pɛər).

Choose the appropriate stress pattern from the options. The syllables are written in capital letters.

association?
subject: ENGLISH LANGUAGE

explanation.text:
Explanation
A great number of words in English only have one syllable (for example go, eat, wait, eight, house, prince, friends, thieves, straight, etc.). In these cases the stress can only be located in that syllable. In longer words the stress can lie in any syllable:
Thus capitalism is stressed as: CAPitalism. it is stressed on the first syllable.
There is an explanation video available below.

explanation.text:
Explanation
Either as used before the first of two given alternatives. When it is used as a determiner, it refers to both choices or possibilities
This means that there are two alternatives. At each end of the building, there is a door.
Either is used only when there are two persons or things. The statement can be interpreted as
''There are two ends in the building, and each of the ends has a door.
There is an explanation video available below.

The building has many ending each and for all

text: which of the following statement is true according to the passage?

options.text: Nigeria's handling of the bird flu pandemic justified African countries' inability to cope with the disaster.
if it had not been quickly controlled, bird flu might have proved more deadly than HIV/AIDS
the death of many poultry birds led to the discovery of bird flu in Nigeria
poultery farms in Nigeria had been quarantined

subject: ENGLISH LANGUAGE

options.text: Nigerians no longer consumed poultry as a result of bird flu
bird flu had already resulted in a high human and livestock death toil
bird flu in Nigeria was first discovered by the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) Diagnostic Centre
the Kaduna poultry farmer who lost many birds was not adequately compensated by government

text: The expression  To return to the status quo ante refers to the

options.text: killing of birds as a result of bird fluand its effects on poultry famers
bird flu pandemic that had ravaged many countries in Europe, Asia and the Middle East
condition of things prior to the incidence of bird flu
state of affairs following the bird flu pandemic in Nigeria
